name: BigDay
description:
What is Big Day?
Big Day is a multiplayer third person action RPG.
In Big Day , a horde of various guns, skills and talents are at your disposal, allowing you to survive with your own style, just like in the classic ARPGS Diablo and Grim Dawn.
Tired of rougelike? Enjoy looting? Give Big Day a try!



Story:
Welcome to a doomsday world full of zombies. Battle , loot and survive with your character. Interact with different NPCs , get a hold of the doomed world to try and solve the mysteries of the zombie plague. Visit places from the real world such as the Manhattan Bridge, China Town, and Europe towns, you’ll even go to the Buckingham Place to save the Queen!


GamePlay:
Explore the world and story of Big Day, face enemies with your own style. Loot, enhance, reforge, pick talents, all the customization you want!


Equipment:
Over 300 base items, combined with random attributes, build your armory with a gorgeous variety of choices. Continue to customize you style, enhance and reforge your equipment.


Battle:
Shotguns, assault rifles, sniper rifles, machine guns, sub-machine guns, heavy artillery, choose your poison!
Each kind of weapon has a different combat style based on the gun’s characteristics.

Talent trees:
Level up to 40 to gain 31 talent points. Distribute them into three different skill trees to customize your play style. You can gain buffs and even change the effects of skills with different talents. In the future we will also perfect the talent trees for more fun and diversity.

No Pain，No Gain
Missions have higher difficulties.
Loot to strengthen yourself for higher difficulties, challenge higher difficulty for better loot. The fun never ends!
